entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
